title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 §§ 197-3.15 - Facilities
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 §§ 197-3.15 - Facilities

State Regulations

Each course shall be presented in such premises and in
such facilities as shall be necessary to properly present the
course. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19
§§
197-3.15

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
